markdownRemark.html: This is a sports and recreational publicly owned complex of the Junta de Andalucía, located 7 km from Linares. It has a 9-hole golf course with lighting and putting green , three outdoor swimming pools , artificial turf soccer field, two tennis courts , a covered sports hall , sports court, artificial turf football pitch, four paddle tennis courts all with lighting, a climbing wall and an outdoor gym circuit. At present the smal 5-hole golf course has two par-5 holes, two par-3s and a par-4. It has a green-fee and arrangements with the Hotels Victoria, Cervantes and Anibal in Linares.

frontmatter.title: Parque Deportivo La Garza
frontmatter.description: Parque Deportivo La Garza -  This is a sports and recreational publicly owned complex of the Junta de Andalucía, located 7 km from Linares. It has a 9-hole golf course with lighting and putting green , three outdoor swimming pools , artificial turf soccer field, two tennis courts , a covered sports hall , sports court, artificial turf football pitch, four paddle tennis courts all with lighting, a climbing wall and an outdoor gym circuit. At present the smal 5-hole golf course has two par-5 holes, two par-3s and a par-4. It has a green-fee and arrangements with the Hotels Victoria, Cervantes and Anibal in Linares.
frontmatter.address: Ctra. De la Fernandina, s/n, 23700 Linares, Jaen, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 9.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 12.00 euros
